text: Sea scorpion may refer to: * Eurypterids, members of the extinct order Eurypterida * Some members of the fish family Cottidae, including the long- spined sea scorpion and short-spined sea scorpion (also known as father lasher) ==See also== * Nepidae - an insect, commonly known as a "water scorpion" Category:Animal common name disambiguation pages
title: Sea scorpion
